Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are expressing their anticipation and hopes regarding the #Budget2023. While some are excited about the first surplus in 15 years and support initiatives to improve access to GPs and primary healthcare others are more concerned about the impact of the budget on workers. Nevertheless announcements of cost of living relief and bonuses for new police recruits demonstrate that there might be something for everyone in this budget. Overall the budget is expected to be in the best traditions of helping those doing it tough broadening opportunities and investing in the future.
